name: Long Way (alto_andre)
description:
This is a simple game I made alone to the 2020 Epic MegaJam.

2020 sure has been a tough year to all of us. But let's not forget that this is not over yet.

The goal of this game is to make the player think about their actions during the COVID-19 pandemic. Or so I tried!

Controls: WASD to move, ESC to pause
